QuestData.Title: Shatter the Shards
QuestData.Description: Atop the battlements of Corp'rethar, the Lich King's minions have erected three crystals, the shards of horror, despair, and suffering. Should our men reach the walls of Corp'rethar, he will unleash these weapons on our army.$B$BIn full effect, the crystals will afflict the minds of our men with paralyzing pain and fear. Then, the Scourge will be able to slaughter them at will.$B$BFind these shards, destroy them, and bring me their broken remains. We cannot allow the Lich King to deploy these weapons!
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Broken Shard of Horror, the Broken Shard of Despair, and the Broken Shard of Suffering to Koltira Deathweaver aboard Orgrim's Hammer.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you shattered the Lich King's new weapons?
QuestData.RewardText: <Koltira takes the crystal shards from you and speaks in a quiet voice.>$B$BI remember these...$B$BLesser men would easily crumble beneath their assault. You have done well in removing their threat.
